# Glowy Cosmetic Products Review Platform

## Project Overview

Building a comprehensive SolidJS web application for Glowy, a cosmetic company specializing in reliable product information and reviews.

## Key Features

- Product catalog with detailed information
- User reviews and ratings
- Price comparison from multiple shops
- Influencer reviews with social media integration
- Product categorization by skin type and characteristics
- User profiles with skin type and preferences
- Personalized product recommendations

## Development Progress

- [x] Project requirements clarified
- [x] Copilot instructions created

- [x] Development tasks configured
- [x] Project launched
- [x] Documentation completed

## Technical Implementation

- **Framework**: SolidJS with TypeScript for reactive UI
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS for modern, responsive design
- **Build**: Vite for fast development and optimized production builds
- **Architecture**: Component-based with centralized state management

## Key Components Implemented

- Product catalog with search and filtering
- Detailed product views with image galleries
- User and influencer review systems
- Price comparison across retailers
- Personalized recommendations based on user profiles
- Responsive design for all devices
